## assertAsyncEventually() function

Assert that an asynchronously evaluated condition is eventually true.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function assertAsyncEventually(testfunc: () => any, { message, timeout, checkEvery, crashOnError }?: {
    message?: string | undefined;
    timeout?: number | undefined;
    checkEvery?: number | undefined;
    crashOnError?: boolean | undefined;
}): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  testfunc | () =&gt; any | The async test function. Must return <code>true</code> to signal success. |
|  { message, timeout, checkEvery, crashOnError } | { message?: string \| undefined; timeout?: number \| undefined; checkEvery?: number \| undefined; crashOnError?: boolean \| undefined; } |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;any&gt;
